text: mariyu miru allah ne aradhincandi mariyu evvarini ayanaku bhagasvamuluga sati kalpincakandi. Mariyu tallidandrulato, daggari bandhuvulato anathulato, nirupedalato, bandhuvulaina poruguvarito, aparicitulaina poruguvarito, prakkanunna mitrulato, batasarulato mariyu mi adhinanlo unna banisalato andaritonu udara svabhavanto vyavaharincandi. Niscayanga, allah garvitunni, badayilu ceppukune vanni premincadu
